products.title: Battleship Grey Satin Perfect Fit
products.description: You want a black blind, your partner wants white; compromise with this relationship-preserving battleship grey satin style. Organic grey with a mid-gloss sheen, it's an elegant neutral that pairs well with monochrome blinds. As their most hard wearing style, aluminium blinds are ideal for humid and high-traffic spaces struggling to cover your french doors? Aluminium perfect fit blinds are a great way to shade each pane, and provide style and privacy at the same time.

products.title: Grey Gloss Perfect Fit
products.description: The shimmering sheen of this grey gloss perfect fit offers a touch of glam to an otherwise neutral hue. Pair with monochromes or pastels for a harmonised interior. Aluminium blinds are their most hard wearing style, while the perfect fit clip-on system installs in 15 minutes, no tools required struggling to cover your french doors? Aluminium perfect fit blinds are a great way to shade each pane, and provide style and privacy at the same time.

products.title: Slate Grey Satin Perfect Fit
products.description: The heavy hue of slate grey is a superb choice for classically styled rooms featuring lots of wood and leather. Clipping direct to the window, perfect fits are a swift and simple shading solution to conservatories, patio doors and 'tricky' windows such as inward-opening styles. Struggling to cover your french doors? Aluminium perfect fit blinds are a great way to shade each pane, and provide style and privacy at the same time.

products.title: Grey Satin Perfect Fit
products.description: Round out a muted palette with this mid-gloss grey satin perfect fit. Its clay tones pair well with pastel decor, with a gentle sheen that catches the light without creating sunglare. Their most hard wearing style, aluminium blinds are ideal for high-traffic or humid spaces. Struggling to cover your french doors? Aluminium perfect fit blinds are a great way to shade each pane, and provide style and privacy at the same time.

products.title: Silver Sparkle Perfect Fit
products.description: Classic grey gets a shimmering upgrade with their silver sparkle perfect fit. Perfect for adding a bit of glitz to your kitchen, conservatory or patio door, its glitterbomb flecks dance in the light for a captivating take on conventional monochrome styles struggling to cover your french doors?
